aircraft.value: Phantom Stealth - AC-7320-773 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Exhaust gas temperature margin reduction. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 01/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 03/04/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 05/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 04/04/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 11/04/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon
